Literature.Title: Potent Chimeric Antimicrobial Derivatives of the Medicago truncatula NCR247 Symbiotic Peptide.
Literature.Author: Jenei J, Tiricz H, Szolomajer J, Timar E, Klement E, Bouni MAA, Lima RM, Kata D, Harmati M, Buzas K, Földesi I, Tóth GK, Endre G, Kondorosi É

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:1.75% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:3.51% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=6.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus HNCMO 112011(MBC=3.1µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MBC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=3.1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MBC=1.6µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13440(MBC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MBC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus HNCMO 112011(MBC=25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MBC=6.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus HNCMO 112011(MIC=3.1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=3.1µM),Human melanoma A375(no activity data)
